alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 25 at 3:21AM EDT until March 26 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. In Vermont, Eastern Franklin, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southeast winds will develop later this afternoon into this evening before abating overnight. The stronger wind gusts will mainly affect favored downslope areas along the western slopes of the Green Mountains, and northwestern slopes of the Northern Adirondacks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland
